mapper.select: SELECT no, content_id, title, content_type_id, area_code, si_gun_gu_code, first_image1, first_image2, map_level, latitude, longitude, tel, addr1, addr2, homepage, overview FROM ssafytrip.spots ORDER BY no

SELECT no, content_id, title, content_type_id, area_code, si_gun_gu_code, first_image1, first_image2, map_level, latitude, longitude, tel, addr1, addr2, homepage, overview FROM ssafytrip.spots WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ssafytrip.spots ( content_id, title, content_type_id, area_code, si_gun_gu_code, first_image1, first_image2, map_level, latitude, longitude, tel, addr1, addr2, homepage, overview ) VALUES ( #{contentId}, #{title}, #{contentTypeId}, #{areaCode}, #{siGunGuCode}, #{firstImage1}, #{firstImage2}, #{mapLevel}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{tel}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{homepage}, #{overview} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.no, /* 관광지 ID */ a.content_id, /* 콘텐츠 ID */ a.title, /* 관광지 제목 */ a.content_type_id, /* 콘텐츠 타입 ID */ a.area_code, /* 지역 코드 */ a.si_gun_gu_code, /* 시군구 코드 */ a.first_image1, /* 대표 이미지 1 */ a.first_image2, /* 대표 이미지 2 */ a.map_level, /* 지도 레벨 */ a.latitude, /* 위도 */ a.longitude, /* 경도 */ a.tel, /* 전화번호 */ a.addr1, /* 주소 1 */ a.addr2, /* 주소 2 */ a.homepage, /* 홈페이지 URL */ a.overview /* 개요 */ FROM ssafytrip.spots a JOIN spot_like sl ON a.no = sl.spot_id WHERE sl.created_at >= #{startDate} GROUP BY a.no ORDER BY COUNT(sl.user_id) DESC, a.no LIMIT 20
